text: xô brrdā p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā xěy meụ̄̀x phwk cêā ca prụks̄ʹā h̄ārụ̄x th̀ān rx sūl pĕnkār s̄̀wntạw (pĕnkār lạb) phwk cêā cng bricākh thān k̀xn kār prụks̄ʹā h̄ārụ̄x k̄hxng phwk cêā nạ̀n pĕnkār krathả thī̀ dī s̄ảh̄rạb phwk cêā læa pĕnkār thả citcı h̄ı̂ p̄h̀xngp̄hæ̂w h̄āk phwk cêā mị̀ s̄āmārt̄h h̄ā mā dị̂ thæ̂ cring xạllxḥˌ pĕn p̄hū̂thrng xp̣hạy p̄hū̂thrng mettā s̄emx
